name: Dragon Slayer (itch) (TG Arts)
description:
smash enemys using turret How many kills can you reach!? Collect stars and open the dragon world and use your fire to defeat enemys in dragon world and after collect 550 star you well get a boss to fight it *Opening the world of dragons you need to collect stars from killing  enemys using turret

I hope you enjoy,

In the next update, there will be an improvement to the game buttons, sounds and settings ,

And more missions with moe enemys .
